sub_title: Regional Director - EMEA | Connecting Clients with the Right Solutions | MBA
summary: My everyday goal, while being a Sales Manager for Reading Bakery Systems, is to connect Clients with their ideal bakery Solutions.  I am here to listen and learn, to teach and advise.  With the help of industry experts at RBS and the Markel Food Group, we can design custom solutions for small AND large bakeries.  And if I don't have the solution for you, I will connect you to the most qualified experts in my network and the baking industry.  I am not here to create sales, I am here to create partners!

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

education.degree_name: Master of Business Administration - MBA (Executive MBA)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the planning and directing of all sales programs, including spare parts, ExAct Mixing, and technical support for the products and services offered by Reading Bakery Systems in Europe, Middle East, Africa and India.

Establish sales objectives and territories for sales staff and develop and execute relationship management processes in conjunction with sales staff and Company executive management.

Identify business opportunities and sales strategies for the current customer base and prospects.  Oversees and evaluates marketing research and adjusts marketing strategy to meet changing marketing strategies and competitive conditions.
profile_positions.title: Regional Director - EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Reading Bakery Systems is a worldwide leader in the baked snack food industry, providing innovative process solutions for pretzel, potato snack, biscuit, cracker and bread snack manufacturers worldwide. 

As the Sales Manager for the EU, CIS, UK, and Turkey I oversee and implement our company's sales and growth strategies within my territory.  Specifically, my responsibilities include, but are not limited to:

- Setting and meeting annual and multi-year revenue targets according to the company's overall growth strategy.
- Implementing sales and marketing strategies to increase sales revenue.
- Organizing and reviewing high value B-to-B sales transactions.
- Generating new leads, qualifying, and converting them into customer accounts.
- Strengthening and expanding partnerships with existing clients.
- Managing relationships and coordinating activities between regional sales representatives.
profile_positions.title: European Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked as a Project Manager within the industrial machinery manufacturing 
        industry.
•	Defined and documented project scope and budget based on desired sales margins for 
        projects ranging in overall value from $100K to $6M.
•	Compiled and ensured compliance with contracted project milestones, deadlines, and schedules 
        for lifecycles ranging from 12 weeks to 3 years.
•	Ensured compliance with product specifications and standards including CE, OSHA, BS
•	Coordinated project lifecycles between internal departments: Sales, Marketing, Engineering, 
        Manufacturing, Shipping/Receiving, Technical Services, R&D, and Spare Parts.
•	Oversaw and coordinated supply and integration of third party vendor equipment
•	Facilitated project meetings and design reviews throughout the life of the project.
•	Oversaw the successful delivery, installation, and commissioning of over 15 projects both 
        domestically and internationally with an emphasis on Russian and Eastern European markets
•      Made quick and reliable decisions in fast-paced and high-stress situations.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Joined a group of entrepreneurs with the goal of creating and growing a drone manufacturing and drone service business.   As a member of the start-up business, known as Onuku Industries, LLC., I gained first-hand experience in business idea generation and validation, market research, labor diversification, generating revenue, brand promotion, investor relations and most importantly...positive thinking!
profile_positions.title: Like-minded Entrepreneur

company.name: International Center for the Studies of Terrorism

profile_positions.description:

- Analyzed personnel, organizations, locations, and events to determine relationships.
- Modeled social, psychological, and cultural properties of adaptive militant networks.
- Gained valuable experience in data collection, processing, and dynamic network analysis.
profile_positions.title: Intern
